text: ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. chea karpit nasa puok yeung ban lyy anak ampeavneav( mou ham meat) del ampeavneav daembi aoy mean chomnue tha chaur puok anak chue leu mcheasa robsa puok anak choh haey puok yeung ka mean chomnue . ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda aphytosa dl puok yeung nouv tosakamhosa teanglay robsa puok yeung phng . haey saum trong me tda loubleang aoy puok yeung nouv ampeuaeakrak robsa puok yeung phng . haey saum trong me tda aoy puok yeung slab now cheamuoy banda anak del sang ampeula phng
